text:
Romeo: Love told me! (Editor’s note: Is it really love if its from a stalker?)
Juliet: This is like SO embarresing. My head is like swimming with thoughts. What if I ask you if you love me? What if you say yes, but you’re lying? Will you say the truth Romeo? I mean, like, how should I act? Am I, like, too silly? Or maybe too into the relationship already? I don’t know Romeo!
Romeo: I’ll swear by the Maccas I love to eat after school!
Juliet: Don’t sware by McDonalds, the food that is eaten in a second.
Romeo: Well what should I swear by?
Juliet: I dunno, don’t swear at all! Swearing’s too quick. Just go, my love!
Romeo: What, are you going to just leave me at this?
Juliet: What more could you want?
Romeo: Honest pledges of love, duh!
Juliet: I already pledged my love! Even still though I would give it again if I had to. I love you infinitely Romeo!
Nurse calls
Give me a sec, Rome.
Juliet exits
Oh, far out, I’m too scared this is all a dream. Its too good to be real.
Juliet enters
Juliet: Surely if you really love me, you’ll be my boyfriend and tell me tomorrow on Snapchat.
Nurse: Juliet!
Juliet: Yeah, I’m coming. But if you don’t really love me Rome, then—
Nurse: Juliet, come!
Juliet: Yeah, I’m coming, geez. —stop trying to get me and just leave me to cry in peace. I’ll send the message on Snap tomorrow.
Romeo: My life depends on it.
Juliet: A thousand times goodnight.
Romeo: It is a thousand times worse to leave you. I want to stay with you forever!
Juliet: I hate being stuck in this house. I want to come with you forever also! And hey, when will we talk on Snapchat?
Romeo: 9am
Juliet: I can’t wait – I’ll be waiting all night for your message!
